msbt.message: I guess it's almost time to say goodbye to you and this island.I'm gonna miss you, but we both have cool new adventures waiting for us, ya know.
I need to start packing soon if I want to move in time.But I'm pretty busy, y'know? Gotta eatgotta go for a walkgotta figure out what to eat
Only a little longer before I'm outta here, .I'm kinda worried, though<10_4 /> I dunno if I have enough boxes for packing.
